EmailTemplate.name: ES-2016-11-09-VDI Pulse Survey Send.ES-2016-11-09-VDI Pulse Survey Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic State of VDI Survey | Win A $100 Amazon Gift Card
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/turbonomic-vdi-pulse-2016?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=survey-vdi-pulse-2016&utm_content=11092016]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) accounts for over 40% of the workloads under Turbonomic management. VDI has gained significant momentum over the past half decade for its centralization of management and cost savings benefits. This 10-minute survey aims to benchmark the pulse of VDI in 2016.
Your participation in this survey is integral to the completion of a seminal document that will serve to benefit a multitude of enterprises as they devise and execute their strategy. This survey will take approximately ten (10) minutes to complete. For your time, you will be entered for a chance to win one (1) of ten (10) $100 Amazon Gift Cards. Thank you for your participation.
TAKE SURVEY NOW <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/turbonomic-vdi-pulse-2016?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=survey-vdi-pulse-2016&utm_content=11092016]]>
- The Turbonomic Team
